title: ex2D
description:
ex2D is a highly integrated 2D-sprite-related development extension for Unity. It aims at providing high performance 2D sprite/UI solution inside Unity, with a specific focus on creating tons of cutting-edge sprite animations and other content in complicated Unity scenes, while still maintaining great performance on mobile devices.

changes:
* New Features
  * Add exSpriteBorder component and exGUIBorder asset for rendering Scale9Grid GUI
  * Draggable resize for exSpriteBorder
  * Add exGUIBorder Editor

* Changes
  * exSpriteAnimation.SetFrame will not change the current playing animation. This is good for pause/resume animation while you still can change frames.
  * Remove SpriteAnimationClip create wizard, will create directly.
  * Add Sync button after Collider type. This will help user quick sync the collider size to fit the mesh
  * Move exPixelPerfect Update codes to LateUpdate
  * Add exLayer2D.ForceSetLayer function

* Bug Fixes
  * Fix SoftClip not clip after RecursivelyActive invoked
  * Fix SoftClip clip scale sprite font wrong
  * Fix renderCamera missing link when using prefab
  * Fix shear x, y at the same time produce wrong calculation
  * Fix exSprite prefab cannot export as Asset Bundle
  * Fix instance prefab in editor will not update mesh collider
  * Fix Undo not affect in for scene sprites and prefab sprites
